languages.text: Однако прежде, чем масштабная резня залила кровью ирригационные каналы планеты, навстречу мстителям из лесов вышел провидец Муаран. Убедив сородичей не вершить возмездия, он и его народ покинули Янус.

But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.
languages.original_text: Однако прежде, чем масштабная резня залила кровью ирригационные каналы планеты, навстречу мстителям из лесов вышел провидец Муаран. Убедив сородичей не вершить возмездия, он и его народ покинули Янус.

traits.locale_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

languages.text: Mais avant que le massacre n'inonde de sang les canaux d'irrigation de la planète, le Grand Prophète Muaran émergea des forêts pour s'adresser aux Aeldaris assoiffés de vengeance. Après avoir apaisé ses semblables, il quitta Janus avec eux.
languages.original_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

traits.locale_text: Mais avant que le massacre n'inonde de sang les canaux d'irrigation de la planète, le Grand Prophète Muaran émergea des forêts pour s'adresser aux Aeldaris assoiffés de vengeance. Après avoir apaisé ses semblables, il quitta Janus avec eux.

languages.text: Doch bevor das große Gemetzel die Bewässerungskanäle des Planeten mit Blut überfluten konnte, tauchte der Runenprophet Muaran aus den Wäldern auf, um zu den Rächern zu sprechen. Nachdem er seine Brüder überzeugt hatte, die Waffen wegzustecken, verließen er und seine Leute Janus.
languages.original_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

traits.locale_text: Doch bevor das große Gemetzel die Bewässerungskanäle des Planeten mit Blut überfluten konnte, tauchte der Runenprophet Muaran aus den Wäldern auf, um zu den Rächern zu sprechen. Nachdem er seine Brüder überzeugt hatte, die Waffen wegzustecken, verließen er und seine Leute Janus.

languages.text: Antes de que la gran matanza tiñera los canales de riego del planeta del color de la sangre, el vidente Muaran surgió del bosque para hablar con los vengadores. Tras convencer a sus hermanos de que contuvieran su cólera, abandonó Janus con su pueblo.
languages.original_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

traits.locale_text: Antes de que la gran matanza tiñera los canales de riego del planeta del color de la sangre, el vidente Muaran surgió del bosque para hablar con los vengadores. Tras convencer a sus hermanos de que contuvieran su cólera, abandonó Janus con su pueblo.

languages.text: しかし大虐殺で惑星の用水路が血で赤く染まるより先に、先見司ムアランが森から姿を現して復讐に駆られた者達に呼びかけた。同族に落ち着くように説得し、彼とその従者はヤヌスを後にした。
languages.original_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

traits.locale_text: しかし大虐殺で惑星の用水路が血で赤く染まるより先に、先見司ムアランが森から姿を現して復讐に駆られた者達に呼びかけた。同族に落ち着くように説得し、彼とその従者はヤヌスを後にした。

languages.text: 这场屠杀本可能会让加努斯血流漂橹，但先知穆兰成功地赶在屠杀爆发之前从森林中现身。他对渴望复仇的艾达灵族发表了讲话，说服他的亲族就此住手。之后，他带领他的人民离开了加努斯。
languages.original_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

traits.locale_text: 这场屠杀本可能会让加努斯血流漂橹，但先知穆兰成功地赶在屠杀爆发之前从森林中现身。他对渴望复仇的艾达灵族发表了讲话，说服他的亲族就此住手。之后，他带领他的人民离开了加努斯。

languages.text: Fakat büyük katliam gezegenin sulama kanallarını kızıla boyamadan önce Ötesezen Muaran, ormandan çıkarak intikam arayışındaki ordulara seslendi. Soydaşlarını harekete geçmemeye ikna etti ve halkıyla beraber Janus'tan ayrıldı.
languages.original_text: But before the great slaughter could make the planet's irrigation canals run red with blood, the Farseer Muaran emerged from the forests to address the avengers. Having convinced his kin to stay their hand, he and his people departed Janus.

traits.locale_text: Ama büyük katliam gezegenin sulama kanallarının kızıl akmasını sağlamadan önce, Ötesezen Muaran ormandan çıkarak intikam arayışındaki ordulara seslendi. Soydaşlarını harekete geçmemeleri için ikna etti ve halkıyla beraber Janus'tan ayrıldı.
